ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Then the fish devoured him and he was to blame.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Then he was swallowed by a large fish as he was worthy of blame.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Then a fish swallowed him, and he was blameworthy.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: The fish swallowed him up and he deserved (all this).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: The fish then swallowed him and he blamed himself. (For not waiting for Allah’s command.)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Then a (big) fish swallowed him as he had done an act worthy of blame.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: So the fish swallowed him while he did that for which he blamed himself
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: then the whale swallowed him down, and he blameworthy.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And the fish swallowed him while he was blameworthy;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and the fish swallowed him while he was blaming himself.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And a fish swallowed him, and he was reproaching himself.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Then the fish swallowed him while he was blameworthy.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Then the big Fish did swallow him, and he had done acts worthy of blame.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Then a (big) fish swallowed him and he had done an act worthy of blame.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: So the whale swallowed him, for he was blameworthy,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Then the fish swallowed him, and he was to blame.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Then the fish swallowed him, while he was blameworthy.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:142] Then the whale swallowed him while he was blameworthy, that is, while he was guilty of a blameworthy thing, having gone to sea and embarked the ship without his Lord’s permission.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And the fish swallowed him while be was blameworthy) he reproached himself for fleeing from his folk;
